text: seonjijadeul-i kkeunh-im-eobs-i geulaessdeus-i geudaeyeo innaehala geuligo geudeul e daehan eungbeol-eul seodulleo guhaji malla geudeul-ege yagsogdoen geos-eul geudeul-i jikyeo bol geunal-imyeon geudeul-eun hyeonsee seo han sigando chelyuhaji anihaessdeon geoscheoleom doelila geudaeneun gyesileul jeon haneun geos-eulo chungbunhanola bulsinjadeul-oeeneun eoneu nugudo myeolmanghaji anh nola
